casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Curtis Loius SANGSTER. No. 84P15-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Curtis Louis Sangster, Raleigh, for Sangster, Curtis L. *500Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of January 2016 by Defendant for Writ of Prohibition:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
